    yasa.hypno_int_to_str¶

    yasa.hypno_int_to_str(hypno, mapping_dict={- 2: 'Uns', - 1: 'Art', 0: 'W', 1: 'N1', 2: 'N2', 3: 'N3', 4: 'R'})[source]¶

    Convert an integer hypnogram array to a string array.

    [0, 2, 2, 3, 4] ==> [‘W’, ‘N2’, ‘N2’, ‘N3’, ‘R’]

    New in version 0.1.5.

    Parameters
    hypnoarray_like

    The sleep staging (hypnogram) 1D array.

    mapping_dictdict

    The mapping dictionnary. Note that this function is essentially a wrapper around pandas.Series.map().

    Returns
    hypnoarray_like

    The corresponding integer hypnogram.
